name: Hatsune Miku Project Diva X Alpha Vita3K version
name_original: Hatsune Miku Project Diva X Alpha Vita3K version
description:
To play this game you need to download Vita3K on this website : https://vita3k.org/


This is a demo for Project Diva X

This demo is already available on PS4 and PS Vita

This demo is only available for chinese or japenese resident, if you are a global player you can always start this game but the game will not being translated to english
